holidays.name: National Pigs in a Blanket Day
holidays.description: A delicious day dedicated to celebrating pigs in a blanket – tasty sausages or hot dogs wrapped in dough and baked to golden perfection! It’s a snack lover’s dream and perfect for a party appetizer.
holidays.origin: This food holiday became popular in America as a quirky way to honor this pillowy, savory treat, likely starting in the late 20th century with the rise of easy party snacks.
holidays.funFact: Pigs in a blanket vary globally: in the UK it’s sausages wrapped in bacon, but in the US, it’s typically hot dogs wrapped in dough.

holidays.name: International Guide Dog Day
holidays.description: A day to honor guide dogs and their trainers who provide incredible support and independence to visually impaired people around the world.
holidays.origin: Started by guide dog associations to raise awareness about the life-changing role of guide dogs and to encourage support for training programs.
holidays.funFact: Guide dogs are trained for about 6 months and can understand over 50 commands to help their handlers navigate safely.

holidays.name: Take a Chance Day
holidays.description: Encourages people to take a risk or gamble on something new—whether it’s trying a new hobby, asking someone out, or making a bold decision!
holidays.origin: An unofficial day popularized through social media and self-help movements focusing on personal growth through risk-taking.
holidays.funFact: Studies show that taking calculated risks can significantly boost creativity and happiness in daily life.

holidays.name: Earth Day (Armenia)
holidays.description: Though Earth Day is globally celebrated on April 22, Armenia observes it on April 24 in remembrance of the environment and nature’s preservation.
holidays.origin: Armenian environmentalists chose April 24 to coincide with historical remembrance while spotlighting ecological awareness.
holidays.funFact: Armenia is one of the earliest civilizations to foster environmental protection, inspired by its stunning mountainous landscapes.
